# 金程教育 AQF 量化金融分析师讲义 2017

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/jincheng-jiaoyu-aqf-lianghua-jinrong-fenxishi-jiangyi-2017
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/jincheng-jiaoyu-aqf-lianghua-jinrong-fenxishi-jiangyi-2017
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install jincheng-jiaoyu-aqf-lianghua-jinrong-fenxishi-jiangyi-2017
jincheng-jiaoyu-aqf-lianghua-jinrong-fenxishi-jiangyi-2017 <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g jincheng-jiaoyu-aqf-lianghua-jinrong-fenxishi-jiangyi-erlingyiqi
jincheng-jiaoyu-aqf-lianghua-jinrong-fenxishi-jiangyi-erlingyiqi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
